${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:StarCore.NAME: Star Core
${modID}:StarCore.FLAVOR: No Caretaker is truly a Caretaker without one of these.

${modID}:StellarCore.NAME: Stellar Core
${modID}:StellarCore.FLAVOR: The original owner must be looking for this.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 2 cards on turn start. NL Recover 1 Energy when using an upgraded card that costs more than 1 Energy.

${modID}:TokenOfGigants.NAME: Token of the Gigants
${modID}:TokenOfGigants.FLAVOR: This is the token given to individuals recognized by the Gigants as a worthy individual.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon using an #y${modID}:Imitation card, reapply the half of the Block and/or Inflict the Damage of the card.

${modID}:RetriggerImitations.NAME: Mimic's Talent
${modID}:RetriggerImitations.FLAVOR: Doesnt this remind you of something...? Maybe.... a soul? Perhaps~ even.... a dark one?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon using an #y${modID}:Imitation card, retrigger the card.
